name: The Leader
description:
What it’s about to lead people from your corporation during the end of the world ?!

From above the situation,  you’re in charge to scream directions to avoid employees falling in dangerous places.

Controls :

Arrows keys of the keyboard

Try Enjoy this very simple game from our very debuts in gameDesign !

Made for Ryan's Lil Game Jam V2, theme was « charge ».

PS : Sorry for no menu and application quit into the app.
